title: Shadcn Admin Go Starter Dashboard
subtitle: Production-ready Full-Stack Admin Dashboard with Go Backend
description: Comprehensive admin dashboard combining Go (Gin + GORM) backend with modern React + Shadcn UI frontend. Features JWT authentication, CRUD operations, data tables with sorting/filtering/pagination, batch operations, file uploads, and OpenAPI/Swagger documentation. Supports dark/light mode and RTL languages.
impact: 60% dev time reduction, auto-generated API docs, ‚≠ê 2 GitHub stars

title: IoT Device Management Platform
subtitle: High-Concurrency Real-Time System (500K+ Connections)
description: Engineered MQTT/WebSocket infrastructure handling 500,000+ simultaneous device connections for QR payment workflows and enterprise EDC/Soundbox systems. Migrated from polling to event-driven architecture reducing server load by 85% with <200ms response time.

title: Paxstorelite - EDC Terminal Management
subtitle: Enterprise Terminal Management System for 5,000+ Devices
description: Robust web system for managing EDC devices with real-time dashboard, map visualization, alerts, firmware handling, and comprehensive reporting. Passed security audits from IT SEC ASIA, BRI Bank, and CIMB performance tests.
impact: 5,000+ devices managed, security audits passed, 99.9% uptime

title: Server Monitoring System
subtitle: Real-Time Server & Service Health Monitoring
description: Comprehensive monitoring solution with 30-second health checks, MikroTik integration, WebSocket live updates, and embedded web GUI. Features automated service discovery, Redis caching, and graceful shutdown mechanisms.
impact: 50+ services monitored, real-time alerts, zero-dependency deployment

title: Auto Backup via SSH
subtitle: Automated Real-Time File Synchronization System
description: Production-ready backup application using rsync and fsnotify for real-time file monitoring. Supports dual backup (SSH + local), flexible authentication, file filtering, debouncing, and systemd service installation.
impact: Real-time sync, automated systemd service, structured logging

title: Professional Portfolio Website
subtitle: Modern Responsive Portfolio with 95+ Lighthouse Score
description: Personal portfolio with JSON-driven content management, real-time search, dark/light mode theming, and mobile-first responsive design. Deployed on custom domain with automated CI/CD pipeline.

title: Nomo Forum Application
subtitle: Full-Featured Forum with React Frontend
description: Community platform with user authentication, threaded discussions, comment system, and real-time interactions. Features React Router, Context API, and automated CI/CD deployment on Vercel.
impact: Full CRUD operations, 40% bundle size reduction, CI/CD pipeline

title: AI Merchant Automation System
subtitle: LLM-Powered Merchant Onboarding with WhatsApp Integration
description: AI-based automation using LLM (GPT) and Go for merchant onboarding via WhatsApp bot. Features prompt engineering for parsing unstructured messages, AI customer service, and natural language transaction queries.
impact: 70% onboarding time reduction, 1,000+ daily interactions, 95% accuracy

title: Personal Notes Application
subtitle: React Notes App with Multi-Language Support
description: Feature-rich note-taking app with English/Indonesian support, dark/light themes, archive functionality, search with debouncing, and Context API state management. Includes custom hooks and protected routes.
impact: 50% dev time reduction, reusable components, i18n support

title: Weather Forecasting App
subtitle: TypeScript Weather App with 100% Type Coverage
description: TypeScript-based weather application with 7-day forecasts, air quality monitoring, astronomical data, and location search. Features comprehensive OpenAPI interfaces and 100% type safety.
impact: 100% TypeScript coverage, responsive design, type-safe development

title: Technotify Landing Page
subtitle: Modern React + TypeScript Landing Page
description: Technology company landing page with atomic design pattern, theme context (dark/light mode), and comprehensive sections. Features responsive TailwindCSS layout and reusable components.
impact: Atomic design pattern, theme system, deployed on Vercel

title: Go Video Conference
subtitle: WebRTC Video Conferencing Platform
description: Scalable video conferencing solution with WebRTC signaling server, Docker multi-stage builds (70% size reduction), and embedded asset management supporting 50+ concurrent users.
impact: 70% image size reduction, 50+ concurrent users, embedded views
